attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern:

My husband and I are just starting our adoption process. Our agency is Chinese
Children Adoption International, and we are blessed to have them working with us.

I want to urge you to reconsider the proposed increase in cost of the I-600A filing.
It will not help adoptive families in the future by adding more to the costs of an
adoption. I will soon be filing my I-600A and have already budgeted the current
cost of the filing.

Again, I pray that you to reconsider the propsed increase in the cost of filing.
Personally, I pray that I can file my paperwork before any change occurs.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Kathleen Yoakum
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kathleen Yoakum
